name: Vicky Viper
description:
Vicky is hungry. It's feeding time! Fortunately for Vicky, there are plenty of tasty critters scampering through her forest. Feast on juicy frogs, bats, bunnies, and her favorite - tasty little mice.

Watch out for disgusting spiders - they taste bitter and make Vicky sick.

Catch bouncing red apples for extra time. Catch a gold apple to become Super Vicky!
